definition: (dialect) strip of land between hills/used in place names/also pr. [ya4]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: We can enjoy the beautiful scene of RedStarCliff when we reach the mountain top.
sentences.chinese: 到達埡口時，就可以欣賞到紅星巖壯觀的景象。
